title: Tenements having a differently abled person or female-headed households shall be given first preference in allotment of tenements
clause_text: Tenements having a differently abled person or female-headed households shall be given first preference in allotment of tenements. Thereafter lots shall be drawn for allotment of tenements from the remaining tenements to the other occupiers. 12)In respect of those eligible occupiers on site who do not join the project willingly the provisions laid down under Regulation No.33 (9) (A) and provisions of MHADA Act. 1977 shall be applicable.
